title: Recruiting OCE (TotalReck)
body:
Starting a new team.

Currently have two players

Mid  (free)
Sup (free)
Jng (free)


Only needs to Play daily
Interested hit me up, add me in game or on this site and msg me saying your keen on joining the TotalReck team.
TheChadMizer

replies.body:
learn, grow and have fun in a group..

sounds like he has the right mindset already.
I can join as a support if you feel...
i would like to join your group im getting my computer fixed and should be able to play on the 10th.. if thats ok but anyway i can play mid and most of the other roles.
Ill join but be warned im pretty bad{{champion:238}}
